TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SocialTagManager extends Microsoft.Office.Server.SocialData.SocialDataManager
Public NotInheritable Class SocialTagManager Inherits SocialDataManager

Docs.summary: Contains methods and properties used to manipulate social tag data.

remarks.para: To access or add a social tag, call the SocialTagManager class to create a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SocialTagManager class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SocialTagManager class using the specified service context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.SocialData.SocialTag AddTag(class System.Uri url, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Taxonomy.Term term) cil managed

Docs.param: A object. The term must exist in the taxonomy that you are using.
Docs.summary: Creates a object with the specified and .

remarks.para: The social tag is external, and therefore visible to users other than the owner, by default.

example.code: Using siteColl As New SPSite(url) Dim serviceContext As SPServiceContext = SPServiceContext.Current Dim mySocialTagManager As New SocialTagManager(serviceContext) Dim myProfileManager As New UserProfileManager(serviceContext) Dim myAccount As String = "mydomain\myalias" Dim myProfile As UserProfile = myProfileManager.GetUserProfile(myAccount) Dim uri As New System.Uri("url") Dim taxSession As TaxonomySession = mySocialTagManager.TaxonomySession Dim termStore As TermStore = taxSession.DefaultKeywordsTermStore Dim term As Term = termStore.KeywordsTermSet.CreateTerm(keyword, termStore.DefaultLanguage) Dim newTag As SocialTag = mySocialTagManager.AddTag(uri, term) Dim myTags() As SocialTag = mySocialTagManager.GetTags(myProfile) For Each aTag As SocialTag In myTags output.Write("<br/> Tag: " & " " & aTag.Url.ToString() & " " & aTag.Term.Name.ToString()) Next aTag End Using

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TaxonomySession As TaxonomySession

Docs.summary: Gets the TaxonomySession associated with this SocialTagManager object.

remarks.para: This property enables you to interact with taxonomies without instantiating your own taxonomy session.
